skillTree.localised_description: Furtive, scheming, sly, cunning, underhand, devious, conniving, double-dealing, and sneaky - valuable traits if you wish to stay alive!
All Skaven are unprincipled and untrustworthy by their foul natures. However, this is rarely a disadvantage in the face of the enemy.
All those who have heard of Natty Buboe fear his arrival on the battlefield

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: There is nothing so great as volume of fire, even for a sniper of Natty's skill.
Made at great expense by the engineers of Clan Skryre, these bullets wipe out not only the target, but everyone nearby.
Constantly supported by Skavenslaves bringing him fresh reloads, Natty never runs out of ammunition
Natty will fire off bullets as fast as his loader can cram them into the chamber
If uninterrupted, Natty can put down an aiming point for the most dread of all Skaven weaponry - the Warpstorm Doomrocket. Woe to any who stray near his marker.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs units with 25 or more entities

skillTree.localised_description: Natty and his shield-rat have reached even higher levels of reloading skill.
There's no such thing as too many bullets. Especially not when killing Dwarves
A Warpstone-enchanted breastplate and a thick steel helmet are useful to protect the wearer from shrapnel.
A dead eye shot is one that kills a Dwarf at over 7,000 paces
A bullet is wasted if it doesn't kill the target in one shot
At home in almost any type of terrain, Natty moves as if he was born to the world above

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
This unit can pass through trees.

skillTree.localised_description: It's not running away. It's knowing when and where to be to secure the best advantage.

effects.description: Cooldown: -33% to "Stay Here, I'll Get Help!"

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
If this unit can hide at its current location it will not be spotted until the enemy is very close.

effects.description: Ability number of uses: +2 for "Stay Here, I'll Get Help!"
Cooldown: -50% to "Stay Here, I'll Get Help!"

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
If this unit can hide at its current location it will not be spotted until the enemy is very close.

effects.description: Ability number of uses: +3 for "Stay Here, I'll Get Help!"

skillTree.localised_description: Those Engineers conversant in ballistics know how best to increase the ranges of their weapons.
Never let them see you shoot from the same place twice
"You're in the sniper's sight, the first kill tonight. Time to die, you're in the bullet's way, Natty Buboe's prey. Say goodbye!"

related_attributes.bullet_text: If this unit can hide at its current location it will not be spotted until the enemy is very close.

skillTree.localised_description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit remains hidden while firing.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

enabled_if: No enemy presence in ability range

backgroundSkills.localised_description: No matter how far, no matter how hard the shot, Natty's going to make it

effects.description:
Attribute: Stalk for Warplock Jezzails units
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
